posts.post_content:
Looking for a few for my set.

Must be in Grade 4 or higher and graded by SGC unless you can guarentee them to cross:rolleyes:

Must be needed for my registry set unless its one of the back I want.


I would love to get a Leech with sovereign back or any other sovereign backed T205's that I need.  


I am not looking to spend a ton of money right now.  Just a few 100rd

Andrew,
Leach has not been confirmed with a Sovereign back and I am unsure if it comes with that particular advertising.

Just an FYI...if you do find one...send me a scan please!

Joshua

Joshua,

        SGC has 11 Leach's graded with a Sovereign back showing in the pop report.

                                               Bruce

Oops...looked at the wrong line last night...I see that it is available...btw, the line I must of looked at was Lee (the minor leaguer). Thanks for catching my mistake.

Joshua
Just incase you still need this one as a scan.:)
Thanks guys...I had a scan (actually two)...this is what happens when you post after midnight in poor lighting :)
